extensionDescription.message: Set up a browser to use Tor SOCKS proxy for enhanced privacy.

infoMessage.message: When you create an Onion Browsing tab, traffic for that tab is proxied over Tor. It enhances your privacy by hiding your location from the servers you visit and from network observers. Combined with anti-fingerprinting technology and diligent browsing habits, it is capable of enhancing your privacy when browsing the web.

newsMessage.message: Visit the Tor Project Website to learn the latest about onion.

forumMessage.message: Visit the Onion Forum to learn more or ask for assistance

hostText.description: Host for the HTTP or SOCKS5 Proxy

portText.description: Port for the HTTP or SOCKS5 Proxy

controlHelpText.message: These options will be inert if used with the default onion HTTP or SOCKS proxy.
controlHelpText.description: Help for configuring the options for the Control Port
